item.name: Browses (for <OBJECT> use either the <BROWSE> pointer or the name of the browse)
Forms (for <OBJECT> use either the <FORM> pointer or the name of the form)

section.description: The <OBJECT>.LOCATE() method displays the Locate dialog box. Limitations: Desktop applications only.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script is attached to a button. It displays the Locate dialog:
